caption.p: Chest CT imaging of case 1 (a), case 2 (b), case 3 (c), case 4 (d) and case 5 (E). (a) CT shows multifocal GGO involving the subpleural regions of both lungs (red arrow). (b) CT shows patchy GGOs of both lungs (red arrow). (c and e) CT shows multifocal patchy GGOs that primarily appear at the peripheral area of both lungs (red arrow). (d) CT shows patchy GGOs in the right upper lobe (red arrow).
